short_summary: Establishment of a standing offer for the supply of soft body armour vests
description: The requirement is for the establishment of a standing offer for the supply of soft body armor vests with a required mandatory National Institute of Justice (NIJ) certification to Fisheries and Oceans Canada more specifically, Conservation and Protection (C&P) Officers and Canadian Coast Guard personnel (CCG) across Canada on an as and when requested basis.
duration_in_months: We have a total duration of procurement which encompasses 3 years with optional two 1-year extensions. This means the overall duration is 7 years
full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
### Bid Opportunity: FP859-221259

#### Tender Details

* **Bid Opportunity ID**: WS4398463089
* **Amendment Number**: 12
* **Publication Date**: January 18, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2024, 14:00:00 EST

#### Bid Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a standing offer to supply soft body armor vests with a mandatory National Institute of Justice (NIJ) certification to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada's Conservation and Protection Officers and Canadian Coast Guard personnel across Canada.

**Request Details:**
The standing offer period is for 3 years, with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods to purchase additional quantities.

**Estimated Quantity:**

* Year 1: 650 units
* Year 2: 300 units
* Year 3: 140 units
* Option Year 1: 140 units (Year 4)
* Option Year 2: 140 units (Year 5)

#### Contract and Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian contracts including agreements with Chile, Panama, Colombia, Korea, Honduras, and others
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None

#### Contracting Entity and Point of Contact

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Julian Roppo-Valente
* **Email**: [julian.roppo-valente@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julian.roppo-valente@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18556234?extsite=MTg1NTYyMzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18556234?extsite=MTg1NTYyMzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Additional Information
All bids must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform. Responses
